item.title: My Developer Personality
item.description: I took a Developer Personality Test, conducted by DZoneand it almost sums up what I am! Here’s the result I got: Collaborative:Good code doesn’t happen in a vacuum. You need a team to keep you energized and on your toes so that you’re constantly improving the project code using the entire team’s varied experience and strengths. You like to talk frequently with colleagues and discuss ideas so that you can learn from others and spark ideas.
